description:
A download tool for clawing the eBooks from the Internet.

Downloading books from Tale Book, 三秋书屋, 天浪书屋, SoBooks and Telegram Channels.
This is a totally rewritten fork compared to its original version.
Changelog
- 1b958fb Update SoBooks website URL to sobooks.cc (#25)
- 0bcffb1 chore: bump go deps.
- 455bd9d chore: clean up the legacy code. bump dependencies. fix some actions.
- 490b276 feat: add the forbidden information.
